Articles.Content:
In honor of KSP not only getting a new terrain, making an ingame downloader, becoming a paid version, but also fixing the plague of deep space, the Kraken. Below are a miscellanea of parts I made myself. The flag texture however, was made by Nova Silisko. Part details below.

The Flag:

Tired of not being able to prove to your buddy that Kerbal\'s were on the Mun first? Then this is the part for you, It\'s a pod that simply attaches to the lander tank that gently sits on the Mun. Great for bases or decoration!

The Kraken:

Recently being defeated by Harv and developer crew, the Kraken is drousy and unaware that he is about to be launched on an orbital path into Kerbol. Sorry about the textures, I\'m still new to this. =P After you install this, start KSP, then close it. If not, the texture will show up gray.

The Perseus Command Module

Only the finest in Kerbal engineering! This new command pod is a bit banged up on the heat shield, but it be fine, more or less. For water landings only!

Download Link

The kraken still exists. They didn\'t have time to fix it. And the patcher isn\'t technically in-game, it\'s a separate program... and also, it was created for 0.14, it was only just fixed. Oh, yeah, and 0.14 was when it became paid.

:-X

Sorry to burst your bubble!

Anyways, I love the Kraken, I\'d love that as an easter egg in future versions of KSP.

Implementation idea: 1% of your missions will run into the space kraken if you venture out of Kerbin\'s SoI.

The space kraken literally collides with your ship, possibly killing everyone

Problem with the perseus capsule : is it specially for 0.14.2 ?

Any chance of a non-command module version of the flag, with an attachment node on top, so i can drop it off the botton of a lander?

Any chance of a non-command module version of the flag, with an attachment node on top, so i can drop it off the botton of a lander?

Just go in the CFG file and replace :

Module : CommandPod

by :

Module : Strut
